## Digital infrastructure for the HMT project

- The HMT archive on github, and the `HmtArchive` package
- Manuscript orthography (the `ManuscriptOrthography`) package
- the `HmtGutenberg` package for publishing pure-text editions of HMT project texts
- Authority lists
- A HMT Greek lexicon
- Dashboards for exploring the digital archive
